Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not dreaming all this, right? I mean, we
haven't even mentioned marriage since I
proposed to you before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I was starting to get really depressed, wondering
if you really wanted to be with me at all...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But now that I know you do, I feel waaaaaay
better!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Man, getting to marry you is like my best dream
come true!
<PAGE>
I'll never let you regret picking me, ever! Thanks,
<MYNAME>! I love you so much!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I promise I'll make you the happiest bride in the
whole wide world!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay! Now that that's done, let's go spread the
good news all 'round town!
<PAGE>
Heh heh. I have to show off my new bride to
everybody, y'know!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news. Congratulations to both
of you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats, you two!
<PAGE>
Still, you were the last person I thought would
get the jump on me, Fritz. I don't know how I
feel about this!
<PAGE>
But ever since you and <MYNAME> started
dating, you'd always swear up and down to me
that you two would be married someday.
<PAGE>
Now you've made that dream a reality, and that's
wonderful. Congratulations!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
H-hey! I told you to keep that a secret!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! You two are engaged now, right? There's
no need for secrets anymore!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, I'm sure you know how he is by
now. Stand by him and keep your eye on him,
okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I wish you both the best. Don't forget to invite
me to the wedding!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. Speaking of wedding invitations, have
the two of you decided which wedding plan you
would like?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nope, we haven't really thought about that part
yet.
<PAGE>
In fact, I don't think we know much about them
at all. Couldja give us the details?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, we've got a lot of different plans to pick
from! That's kinda exciting.
<PAGE>
It's not every day a guy gets married, so I'm
really tempted to make it a big bash...but my
wallet might not like that.
<PAGE>
I think I'll let you pick, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
No matter which plan you pick, it's still gonna
be our wedding ceremony, so that automatically
makes it the best ever. ♪
<PAGE>
I'm so excited, I'm shaking! This is a dream
come true...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've always considered myself a patient man, but
waiting for your answer left me on pins and
needles.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>When you first turned down my proposal, I
couldn't help but think you admired me, as an
older man, rather than loved me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But after all that waiting, you have finally
answered me with the one thing I wanted to
hear.
<PAGE>
This time, may I believe with confidence that
you truly love me?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Thank you, <MYNAME>. You don't know what it
means to me to hear that.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Once we marry, there may be more occasions
when our age gap becomes a concern. But I'll
make you so happy you won't mind.
<PAGE>
I swear you will never regret choosing me.
Never.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I promise, I will make you happy for the rest of
your life. I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, what say we go deliver the happy
news to the rest of the town?
<PAGE>
We should make the guild our first stop. We
ought to ask Veronica how to go about
preparing for the ceremony.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news. Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now, if I remember correctly, there are a handful
of different wedding plans we can choose from,
yes?
<PAGE>
This is a first for me, so I would appreciate it if
you could explain them to us in detail.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I would have no problem if you
chose whichever plan you like best.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We will only ever have this ceremony once, after
all. I don't want you having any regrets about it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Having you there by my side, that alone will
make this the greatest ceremony of my life.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But don't take too long making your decision, all
right? I am already looking forward to it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I have to admit, I was getting worried. Your
answer is so late in coming, I'd started to
wonder if you'd forgotten I'd proposed at all!
<PAGE>
But while I was waiting, you were no doubt
pondering the question. I was in your thoughts,
perhaps constantly...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Of course, I gladly accept your answer. Thanks
for choosing me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you so much. You have no idea how glad I
am that I met you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come, let's go share the happy news with the
rest of the town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news! Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey! What's the big idea, Raeger?! You never
warned me this was comin'!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Luckily enough, I happened to be here in the
guild office, so I overheard it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You'd better not have been planning to keep me
in the dark about it, though!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no. I was going to tell you, of course.
<PAGE>
...Eventually. I figured you'd probably make a
ludicrously big deal out of it, so I was just
planning to...save you. For last.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey! What was that?! I could've sworn I heard
something I wouldn't like come out o' that
mouth of yours!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Well, whatever! Congrats to both of you. But
you'd better invite me to the wedding, or else!
You got it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yes. Speaking of wedding invitations, have
the two of you decided which wedding plan you
would like?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not yet, no. We were just getting to that part.
Could you give us some of the details on each
of the plans?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just knowing that this ceremony is going to be
ours makes me plenty happy, <MYNAME>. I'm
okay with any of the three.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll let you pick, so you can choose the one that
will make you the happiest. No holding back on
my account, okay?
<PAGE>
Whew. I can't even put into words how much
I'm looking forward to this. I can't wait to hear
what date it'll be set for!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be frank, I was starting to regret that I had
allowed my possessive nature to take command,
proposing to you before you were ready.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I do want to marry you. I'd love nothing more
than for us to be a true family. But that day, I
was unable to properly express my intent.
<PAGE>
In fact, I'd said it in such a way that it would've
been no surprise at all if you'd turned me down.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Yet you gave your answer honest thought, and
still chose me in the end!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I promise you that I will do everything in my
power to make you happy.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you.
...And now you are finally mine...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, then, we ought to bring the good news of
our marriage to my sister and the rest of the
town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I simply must show off my adorable bride-to-be,
after all!
<PAGE>
...My, my. Your face has gotten awfully red. If
you're feeling embarrassed, there's a spot behind
my back for you to hide. Always.
<PAGE>
I would rather not let anyone else see how lovely
you look when you blush. That side of you...is
for me alone.
<PAGE>
...Now then, shall we be going?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news! Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations! I couldn't be happier hearing
that two of my favorite people in the world are
getting married.
<PAGE>
Mistel, you be sure you make <MYNAME>
happy, okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course I will. I will make <MYNAME> the
happiest bride the world has ever seen.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, please take good care of my little
brother.
<PAGE>
I hope the two of you will build a wonderfully
happy family together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Not that I need to tell you that, I'm sure. Oho ho
ho! I look forward to receiving my wedding
invitation.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yes. Speaking of wedding invitations, have
the two of you decided which wedding plan you
would like?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not yet. In fact, we were going to discuss that
next.
<PAGE>
Would you be kind enough to tell us the details
of what plans are available?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Personally, I do not like the idea of an overly
fancy wedding. However, if that's what you
wish, my love, then I shall readily concede!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So please choose whichever one you like best.
<PAGE>
To me, the best plan is the one that will make
you the happiest.
<PAGE>
For no matter how fancy the ceremony, in the
end, it is you and I who will be the arbiters of
each other's happiness.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hee hee. I can hardly wait for the day upon
which I can finally address you as my wife!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
WHEW! An answer! Finally! You have no idea
how much I've been stressing about this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I mean, you said you'd think it over, and then I
didn't hear a peep out of you!
<PAGE>
I was worried you might be pretending it'd never
happened. I'm soooo glad I was wrong!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm sure you know this by now, but it took a lot
of courage for me to propose to you like that.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>And then you kept me waiting an eternity, to
boot! But that just made hearing your "yes" all
the sweeter.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you for choosing me.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you. And I'll make you happy. You have
my word.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Okay. I don't see the need to trudge all over
town telling everyone we're getting married, but
we should at least tell Veronica.
<PAGE>
After all, it's not like either of us know how this
town handles wedding ceremonies, right?
<PAGE>
There are supposed to be a handful of different
plans to choose from. Let's get some details
from Veronica.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news! Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Thanks!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, er, I hear this town has some different plans
people can choose from for their wedding.
<PAGE>
Could you tell us more about them?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm. I'm guessing you'll have more of a
preference here than I do...so you pick!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If you tell me to, I'm warning you right now I'll
go straight for the Simple Plan. That's just how I
roll!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This is going to be a once-in-a-lifetime memory,
though, especially for the blushing bride. So
pick whichever one will make you happiest.
<PAGE>
I'll wait as long as it takes, so feel free to take
your time and think it over.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>After all, this is our wedding. Just the fact that
it's happening at all is enough to make me
positively giddy!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, um...was that your answer to my proposal?
You really do want to marry me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>You didn't say anything at all for so long, I was
starting to get worried.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I really didn't want us to brush it off like nothing
happened, so I was wondering if I should
propose again.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>But now I know you really do want me. Thank
you. You have no idea how happy that makes
me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you. I promise I'll make you happy, so
please, stay by my side.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I guess I'm going to have to write a letter to my
old hometown, letting them know I'm getting
married.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But we can give the good news to the people
here ourselves. Let's go together, okay?
<PAGE>
We should probably tell Veronica first. We'll have
to ask her about how to set up the ceremony
and stuff, too.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news. Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I heard there are different plans we can pick
from for the ceremony.
<PAGE>
Could you tell us a little more about them,
please?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which plan do you like best, <MYNAME>? I'm
sure you have your dream wedding like a lot of
girls do, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This will be our one and only wedding, so I want
you to pick whichever plan will make you the
happiest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Besides, just knowing that this will be our
ceremony already makes it the best to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I can't wait to see which one you decide on!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness! How much time did you truly need to
think over something so simple?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I had almost grown weary of waiting for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>It wasn't just anyone offering to marry you, you
know. It was me! How could you not say "of
course!" right on the spot?!
<PAGE>
I canNOT believe that you would willingly make
me wait in such uncomfortable uncertainty for
so long, you...! You...!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...You're late, you idiot!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>...I was really, really worried, okay?
<PAGE>
After all, you're really popular with everyone in
town, and I was so rude to you when we first
met.
<PAGE>
When we first agreed to be together, I was over
the moon...But before long, I realized that wasn't
enough for me.
<PAGE>
And when I finally gathered up the courage to
propose, you DARED turn around and tell me to
"let you think about it?!"
<PAGE>
You're MY boyfriend! You're only allowed to
marry ME! What's there to think about?
<PAGE>
You could have at least had the decency not to
keep me waiting and give me the correct answer
sooner!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>But...I really do love you, you know.
<PAGE>
And I WILL have you take responsibility for
making me fall in love with you this much. Let's
spend the rest of our lives together.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, as annoying as it may be, we should
now go inform everyone of the happy news.
<PAGE>
Come, let's go, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news. Congratulations, both of
you.
Congratulations, Lady Elise. Master <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you. Once I get home, I will send a letter
to my family immediately. Please have
everything ready for me.

As you wish, Lady Elise. What shall we do about
the wedding invitations? As it will be a very
special occasion...
<PAGE>
...Might I suggest that we invite all of your
acquaintances, to make the ceremony fittingly
extravagant?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. Speaking of which, have the two of you
decided which wedding plan you would like?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, we haven't yet decided. Could you please tell
us what each of these plans involves in more
detail?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, this will be my wedding. You would never
consider making it drab or spartan...would you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Though, then again, I'll be with you in any case.
That does guarantee a certain...splendor, I
suppose.
<PAGE>
A-anyway, I will leave the decision to you! Be
sure to use your best, most considerate
judgment, as befits a man!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I can hardly wait to find out when our special
day will be.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you sure you want to marry
me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I've been thinking, I was wrong to propose to
you so quickly, rushing you like that.
<PAGE>
I wanted so much to be with you, to hear this
one answer, that I couldn't help myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Have you made up your mind for sure? No
regrets?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I see. I believe you, <MYNAME>. And...thank
you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you, <MYNAME>. You have no idea how
